sentence.text: However, to the chloride transport of our knowledge, the role of regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II in human colorectal cancer (CRC) is still unclear.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Overexpression of regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II significantly inhibited the proliferation in vitro and CRC tumor growth in nude mice.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Taken together, our study demonstrates that regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II inhibits proliferation and tumorigenesis through inactivation of the Wnt/Î²-catenin pathway in CRC cells.
